item.title: Do You Know The Right Way To Spell Muesli? Find Out Now!
item.description: What is Muesli? Muesli is a type of cereal made from a combination of raw rolled oats, nuts, fruits and seeds It is usually served as a breakfast cereal with milk or yogurt, but it can also be eaten as a snack or as part of a meal The name muesli comes from the German word “mues” which means “mixture” History of Muesli Muesli was first developed in 1900 by Swiss doctor Maximilian Bircher-Benner as a nutritious meal for his patients He believed that eating a combination of raw fruits, nuts, and grains was the best way to maintain optimal health Since then, muesli has become a popular breakfast cereal around the world
